pack.golden-darkmoon-faire: Golden Madness at the Darkmoon Faire

menu.go-premium-header: Support the dev and remove the ads
menu.not-logged-in-header: Log in to save your progress online

stats.title: Stats overview
stats.stat-tooltip: You played {{numberOfRuns}} runs and {{totalMatches}} matches with {{playerClass}} with a {{winrate}}% winrate
stats.faced-tooltip: You faced {{opponentClass}} {{totalMatches}} times with a {{winrate}}% winrate

empty-state.title: Nothing here yet
empty-state.subtitle: Start playing Arena to receive information

owned.dontown: Only the ones I do not have
owned.missingplayablecopies: Only cards where I miss playable copies
owned.notpremiumnotcompleted: Only cards with missing non-golden copies

card-history.title: My Card History
card-history.empty-state-subtitle: Open a pack to start one!

empty-state.title: No history yet
empty-state.subtitle: Open a pack to start one!

pack-stats.title: All-time packs ({{value}})
pack-stats.best-opened-packs-title-tooltip: Best packs you opened with Firestone running
pack-stats.pack-stat-tooltip: You received {{totalPacks}} {{packName}} packs since you started playing Hearthstone

set-stats.title: Set stats
set-stats.packs-received-tooltip: All-time packs received, including the ones that are still unopened.
set-stats.dust-tooltip: You need {{value}} dust to complete the set
set-stats.duplicate-dust-tooltip: You can gain {{value}} dust by disenchanting non-golden duplicate cards
set-stats.golden-dust-tooltip: You need {{value}} dust to complete the golden set
set-stats.golden-duplicate-dust-tooltip: You can gain {{value}} dust by disenchanting golden duplicate cards

no-missing-card-in-set.title: This set is complete and you have it all!
no-missing-card-in-set.subtitle: Keep up the good work.

no-card-in-set.title: No cards from this set yet!
no-card-in-set.subtitle: Don't worry, keep playing and get new packs.

no-golden-card-in-set.title: No golden cards from this set yet!
no-golden-card-in-set.subtitle: Don't worry, keep playing and get these shiny friends.

no-search-results.title: Oh No! Nothing Matches: "{{value}}"
no-search-results.subtitle: Don't give up - check the spelling or try less specific terms.

default.title: Nothing to show here
default.subtitle: Please start Hearthstone to synchronize the collection.

filters.filter-info-tooltip: Changing these filters will also impact the stats displayed in the decktracker in-game

rank-group.per-day-tooltip: Show the rating at the start of each day

matchup-info.reset-button-tooltip: Reset the win/loss stats of the current deck. The previous matches will still appear in the replays tab.
matchup-info.reset-confirmation: Your win/loss stats have been reset.
matchup-info.delete-confirmation: This will permanently delete the deck from all your stats and can't be undone.
matchup-info.delete-tooltip: Delete your deck. This can't be undone. If you just want to hide it, consider archiving it instead.

deck-summary.archive-button-tooltip: Archive this deck (you can restore it later)

decks.empty-state-subtitle: Play a ranked match to get started, or check your filters above :)

rating-graph.empty-state-message: Please make sure a unique game mode (Standard, Wild or Classic) is selected above, and check the Bronze / Legend filter.

rank-group.per-day-tooltip: Show the rating at the start of each day

last-warbands.title: Last {{value}} matches
last-warbands.damage-dealt-tooltip: Total damage dealt by each unit. The damage for units with the same name is aggregated, and not split per unit
last-warbands.damage-taken-tooltip: Total damage received by each unit. The damage for units with the same name is aggregated, and not split per unit
last-warbands.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds with this hero to collect some information

warband-stats.community-tooltip: Average total stats (attack + health) on board at the beginning of each turn battle

winrate-stats.community-tooltip: Average winrate (% chance to win a battle) per turn for this hero

mmr.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds with this hero to collect some information

rating.title: MMR / Matches
rating.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds to collect some information

rows.total-dmg-dealt-hero-tooltip: Doesn't include fights against the ghost
rows.max-dmg-dealt-hero-tooltip: Doesn't include fights against the ghost
rows.battle-luck-explain-link-tooltip: An indicator that tells you how lucky you were in your battles during the run. Click for more info

game-mode.all-tooltip: Community stats will only show data for Heroic Duels. Your own stats will show both Casual and Heroic.
game-mode.casual-tooltip: Community stats will only show data for Heroic Duels. Your own stats will only show Casual.

deck-stat.title: Deck stats
deck-stat.dust-missing-tooltip: Total dust required to craft the missing cards in this deck
deck-stat.archive-deck-tooltip: Archive deck (you can restore it later)

stats.tier-list-title-tooltip: The tiers are computed based on your current filters

classes-recap.title: Stats overview
classes-recap.stat-tooltip: You played {{numberOfRuns}} runs and {{totalMatches}} matches with {{playerClass}} with a {{winrate}}% winrate
classes-recap.faced-tooltip: You faced {{opponentClass}} {{totalMatches}} times with a {{winrate}}% winrate

empty-state.title: Nothing here yet
empty-state.subtitle: Start playing Duels to receive information

attack.opponent: Your opponent has {{value}} total attack from board and hero

counters.bolner: {{value}} was the first battlecry card played this turn

multicaster.player: You will draw {{cardsTotal}} cards from spell schools: {{schools}}
multicaster.opponent: Your opponent will draw {{cardsTotal}} cards from spell schools: {{schools}}

brilliant-macaw.player: {{value}} was the last battlecry card you played
brilliant-macaw.opponent: {{value}} was the last battlecry card your opponent played
brilliant-macaw.settings-tooltip: When you have a Brilliant Macaw in hand, show the last Battlecry card that you played, if any

elemental.player: You have played {{lastTurn}} elementals last turn, and {{thisTurn}} elementals this turn
elemental.opponent: Your opponent has played {{lastTurn}} elementals last turn, and {{thisTurn}} elementals this turn

elwynn-boar.opponent: {{value}} boars have died for your opponent

fatigue.opponent: Your opponent's current fatigue damage is {{value}}

galakrond.opponent: Your opponent has invoked Galakrond {{value}} times

hero-power-damage.player: Your hero power has dealt {{value}} damage this game
hero-power-damage.opponent: Your opponent's hero power has dealt {{value}} damage this game

jade.opponent: Your opponent's Jade Golem size is {{value}}

libram.player: You have played {{value}} librams this game
libram.opponent: Your opponent has played {{value}} librams this game

spell.player: You have played {{value}} spells this game
spell.opponent: Your opponent has played {{value}} spells this game

watchpost.player: You have played {{value}} watchposts this game
watchpost.opponent: Your opponent has played {{value}} watchposts this game

decktracker.title: Deck Tracker
decktracker.text: Track your cards in game and your deck stats.

battlegrounds.title: Battlegrounds
battlegrounds.text: Our in game helper will appear once you start a game! We will accompany you along your game from hero selection to post match.

duels.title: Duels
duels.text: Check global and personal stats, and see a selection of succesful decks for both Casual and Heroic Duels.

arena.title: Arena
arena.text: Check your latest Arena runs and rewards.

replays.title: Replays
replays.text: Here you can find all your past games, broken into step by step actions.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.text: Challenge yourself throughout the game. Here you'll find all the feats you have accomplished.

collection.title: Collection
collection.text: Here you can find all the cards in the game, with detailed information (you can even play the sounds they make).

new-version.title: New version: {{value}}
new-version.dont-show-again-secondary: You can change that in the settings

import.import-deckstring-tooltip: Import a deck code from your clipboard
import.invalid-deck-code-text: We couldn't recognize the deck code that was provided.

stats.deck-winrate-tooltip: This deck's winrate in ranked since {{value}}
stats.deck-winrate-vs-class-tooltip: This deck's winrate in ranked against {{opponent}} since {{date}}

battle.win-chance-tooltip: Your chances of winning the current battle
battle.tie-chance-tooltip: Your chances of tying the current battle
battle.lose-chance-tooltip: Your chances of losing the current battle
battle.lethal-dealt-tooltip: % chance to kill the enemy hero

composition-not-supported.general: This composition is not well supported, results may be off (reason: {{value}})
composition-not-supported.bug: An unknown error occured, a bug report has automatically been sent out to the devs

battle.sim-sample-link-tooltip: Open a simulation sample leading to this result in your browser

sim.simulate-button-tooltip: Simulate the battle with the new boards
sim.export-button-tooltip: Copy the simulation code to share it and reimport it in the simulator (it's quite big at the moment and doesn't fit in a tweet)
sim.export-confirmation: Simulation code copied to the clipboard
sim.import-button-tooltip: Import a simulation code to populate the simulator
sim.reposition-button-tooltip: (BETA) Find the best positioning for your board. Depending on the number of CPUs and the complexity of the boards, this can take a several minutes, and will use a lot of CPU and RAM.
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-firstpass: Running a few (~50) simulations for each possible permutation to quickly eliminate the least promising ones
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-secondpass: Running a few hundreds (~250) simulations to get the most promising ones
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-finalresult: Running a full simulation on the most promising candidates. This is the longest step and can take several minutes
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-done: Best candidate found, cleaning things up
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-cancelling: Cancelling processes, please wait a short while
sim.empty-state-subtitle: Your first battle will show here after you face an opponent
sim.summon-mechs-tooltip: Gives the minion "Deathrattle: summon three 1/1 mechs"
sim.summon-plants-tooltip: Gives the minion "Deathrattle: summon two 1/1 plants"
sim.sneed-deathrattle-tooltip: How many times has Sneed's Hero Power been used on this minion

hero-stats.matches-played-tooltip: Total matches you played with this hero
hero-stats.turn-winrate-tooltip: Battle winrate per turn (it gives you an indication of when this hero is the strongest)
hero-stats.winning-tribes-title-tooltip: Percentage of each tribe present in average in top 4 warbands

opponents.title: Other opponents
opponents.empty-state-subtitle: Pick a hero and wait for your opponents!
opponents.score-board-tooltip: Recap of all the encounters you had with the other players
opponents.triple-tooltip: Since last fight, this opponent got {{quantity}} tier {{tier}} minions as rewards for tripling

composition.empty-state-subtitle: Older games, or very long games, don't have the turn-by-turn composition stored.

overlay-button.tooltip: Click to show / hide the app window

board.opponent-not-met: You have not fought that player yet
board.stats-share-warning: Multiple distinct minions, as well as golden minions, share the same stats (because of how Battlegrounds is coded)

battlegrounds.empty-state-subtitle: Start playing Battlegrounds to receive information

hsdecks.pitch: hearthstone-decks.net shares Decks played at High Legend for all constructed modes, News & Articles.
hsdecks.next: If you decide to sync to hearthstone-decks.net, Firestone will send them each game you play anonymously with some info about your games (Deck Code, Rank, Game Results)

general.flash-window-tooltip: Flash HS window on your turn, or when the Recruit phase starts in BG

bug-report.title: Send feedback / Report a bug
bug-report.simulator-bug-text: If you want to report a bug with the simulator (and want to help me as much as possible), please check the how-to
bug-report.general-bug-text: For other big issues (app not working), there are some helpful troubleshooting steps
bug-report.message-placeholder: Your message. If you're reporting a bug, please try to describe what you were doing when the bug occurred, and what happened that caused you to report this bug.
bug-report.status-done: Feedback sent. Thank you for reaching out! Stay up-to-date on by joining us on {{discordLink}} or on {{twitterLink}}

global.minions-play-order-tooltip: Show the play order of each minion on board, to help you track deathrattle resolve orders (or anything that relies on the order in which minions arrived on the board)
global.show-title-bar-tooltip: Show/hide the deck name and cards left in hand and deck
global.show-control-bar-tooltip: Show/hide the bar with the logo and the control buttons
global.show-rarity-color-tooltip: Color the mana cost of cards in the tracker based on the card's rarity
global.show-deck-winrate-tooltip: Show the deck overall Ranked winrate above the tracker, if we have data (in either Standard or Wild, based on the current game mode)
global.show-matchup-winrate-tooltip: Show the deck overall Ranked winrate against the opponent's class above the tracker, if we have data (in either Standard or Wild, based on the current game mode)
global.show-gifts-separately-tooltip: Display cards that have been created in their own lines (one line for each different creator)
global.show-stats-change-tooltip: Show stats changed for some cards in the decklist (e.g. Ignite, Blacksmithing Hammer)
global.show-cost-reduction-tooltip: Update the mana cost of cards in the deck when their cost has been modified by an effect (e.g. Incanter's Flow)
global.highlight-related-cards-tooltip: When active, related cards will be highlighted on your decklist when mousing over specific cards (for instance, mousing over Double Jump in your decklist will highlight all Outcast cards in your deck)
global.close-tracker-on-end-tooltip: Automatically close the tracker when the game ends. If disabled, the tracker needs to be closed manually
global.close-tracker-on-end-advanced: Got it, Firestone won't close the tracker when the match ends
global.reset-button-tooltip: Reset the decktracker positions. This can solve an issue where your tracker doesn't show up anymore on screen
global.reset-button-confirmation: Decktracker positions have been reset, and will be applied in your next match.

collection.pack-stats-show-only-buyable-packs-toolt: Show only the packs that can be bought in the shop, hiding all promotional / reward packs

duels.hide-stats-below-threshold-tooltip: Hide stats with fewer than {{value}} data points
